replies.body:
Ladies and gentlemen... Classy trolling. 

How to troll without being a troll... 
______________________________

I wish there was a gentlemen {{champion:48}} 

http://img.prntscr.com/img?url=http://i.imgur.com/7NPmMCz.png

Dunno who made this but you know.. Kuddos to them.
{{champion:48}} Good day sir, and i bid you a farewell, for you have been undoubtedly been broken beyond repair.
{{champion:48}} *uses http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/4/4c/Frozen_Domain.png/revision/latest?cb=20130929123345* I am sorry but this area belongs to me now!
"I must inform you that if you wish for my blows to your cranium to cease, you should perish in a more timely fashion."
So much better then what I said! XD And its hilarious.

We need fancy dapper skins for All the monstrous Champions.
Can you imagine {{champion:58}} in a fresh suit or {{champion:421}} in a beautiful dress?
glentlemen/ladie monster, why this isnt a skin-series yet?
... how is this not a skin yet O.o
Every time I get "muted" about 10 minutes later whoever "muted" me responds to something I say and I just laugh. Its like "zomg im ignoring you be offended rawr"

Every time I SAY "muted", I hear people on the other team about 10-15 minutes later go "wow, dude, salty much?" when no one seems to be saying anything in chat... then I remember, "oh right... I actually did what I said I was going to do."
i loved the fairly odd parents lol.
